PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-03792002-03-190,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of CLAUDIA SIMON, of Big Cove First Nation, New Brunswick, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Patrick M. Polchies, whose term has expired.
Attachments
